high_descs: Move forward and turn right to face the desk.
Pick up the bowl that is on the desk.
Turn left and turn back to the right to face the lamp.
Turn on the lamp that is on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the desk while holding the bowl.

high_descs: Turn to the right to the wooden drawer.
Pick up the white bowl that is next to the table lamp.
Turn around and turn back again to the wooden drawer.
Turn on the light while still holding the white bowl.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the table lamp on the wooden drawer while holding a white bowl.

high_descs: grab the white bowl on the dresser
turn left and turn right face the lamp on the dresser
anns.task_desc: grab the white bowl on the dresser, turn on the lamp
